name: ga-project4-frontend
description: ## User Stories 1. As a user I want to submit a blog entry. 2. As a user I want to edit my blog submissions. 3. As a user I want to filter/sort blog entries with interactive criteria. 4. As an Admistration I want to manage the alumni list (blog members that can submit). 5. As a developer I need to setup GIT repository for GA-Project4-FrontEnd. 6. As a developer I want to have my Frontend setup as an Angular Project.
